data.text: Jisu'n Pathian anisuo thengnga, ama'n asiamruoi ngai khale Kidron tuiwakuok inrakaanna inleisi. Khawakhan rahuon inkhat aleiom halli Jisu khat-um asiamruoi ngai'n rahuon khan inleiluut.
Jisu kajuorsipa Judas innum amunkha aleijet; ajarchu Jisu'n asiamruoi ngai khale khawa munkhan inlei inmujol.
Judas in Rome raalmi rahooi khat-um Thiampu kalian ngaili Pharisee ngai iheitir Biak-inn kangaak mi ngai khale sariakmei, meiser khat-um chemli thal inchoiya rahuon khan inleisi.
Jisu'n ama chungnga akasuoksik rakip kha ijet khale inruoiya, ama'n aheisuok-ah inmani ngaidiang aleiti, “Tume nangni'n ning-entok?”
“Nazareth Jisu,” Inmani'n ama diang inleimasang.
Jisu'n inmanidiang “Kei ama kha ka eii,” aleitipi phakhan, inmani ngaikha nuktiang inkirra khat-um neipilla inleipur.
Jisu'n inlet-ah inmanidiang aleirakel, “Tume nangni'n ning-entok?”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Kei'n nangnidiang amakha kei ka-eii katijei.” “Nangni'n kei ningna entok e-inchu, hiwa leiilaak mi ngaihi sitarasu.”
“Nang in kei kadiang ninapeii ngaihi kei'n tuteii inkhat-um minmangmong,” ileiti chongkha huui hongtungnasik eii.
Chem kachoi Simon Peter in achem kha akeisuoli Thiampu Kaliankhetpa suok inkhat achangtiang kuorkha atuktanpi. Suokpa ramingkha Malchus inti.
Jisu'n Peter diang aleiti, “Nachem kha akok suungnga thunro; Pa Pathian in keidiang innapejei poongna rabingkha kei'n inmak ningngabe?” Matt 26:39; Mk 14:36; Luk 22:42
Rome raalmi le inmani raallu kakeipa khat-um Jihudi kalok kalian ngai'n Jisu kha insurra inleikhuop.
Mansakhet-ah Anna diang inleiruoi; ajarchu ama kha khawa kumma Thiampu Kaliankhet ka eii Caiaphas tarpu alei-eii.
Caiaphas kha eii Jihudi thomatorna ranak kanei ngaidiang miring inkhat in mi rakip sik-ah akathi sik hi athawiai tia akaleiminchu. Jn 11:49,50

Simon Peter li siamruoi inkhat in Jisu kha inleijui. Hiwa siamruoipa hichu Thiampu kaliankhetpa le inlei-injet jarra ama khachu Thiampu kaliankhetpa omna inn tuollaidung katung Jisu le inruoiya aleiluut,
takkha Peter chu kot kuungnga aleingir. Siamruoi inkhatpa khan inlet-ah tuol aheisuok rit-ah khat-um kot kangaak numeisanu diang inrilpuiya Peter kha-um aleikeiluut.
Kot kangaaknu khan Peter diang aleiti, “Nang-um hiwa miringpa siamruoi inkhat emakchebe?”
Suokngai khat-um inn kangaak raalmi ngai'n aleidaipi jarra meiholmei inleitho, halli inmani ngai'n inngirra mei inleioot. Peter um inmani ngaile a-ngirra mei aleioot.
Thiampu Kaliankhetpa khan Jisu diang ama siamruoi ngai khat-um ama iminchu jarra aleirakel.
Jisu'n amadiang aleimasang, “Kei'n manmasituol diang inlarra kariljei; Jihudi ngai rakip honginchunna Synagogue-ah khat-um Biak-inna kei'n kaminchujol. Kei'n ruuk-ah iteii rilmong.
Angsik-ah nang in keidiang ninarakelme? kei iril karangai inmani ngaidiang rakelro, kei'n angme inmanidiang kileiril; kei ileiril kha inmani ngai'n injet.”
Jisu'n hiwa atisuo phakhan, Ngirra kaom raalmi inkhat in Jisu kha aleikabeella aleiti, “Thiampu Kaliankhet diang hintho-ah namasangsik suok-abe?”
Jisu'n amadiang aleimasang, “Kei'n kadikmak kaleiril inchu, kadikmak nakha heitiro; takkha kei'n akadikkha kaleiril inchu, angjarra kei ninawuokme?”
Anna in Jisu kha inkhitpumma Thiampu Kaliankhet Caiaphas diang aleithak.
Simon Peter kha a-ngirra mei oot-ah alaleiom. Inmani ngai'n amadiang inleiti, “Nang-um ama siamruoi inkhat emakchebe?”
Peter in akuor ituktanpipa unai kasuok Thiampu Kaliankhetpa suok inkhat in aleirakel, “Kei'n nang amale rahuon suungnga kinamu emak abe?”
Peter in woikhat inlet-ah maleisei aleiril; halli khawapha takkhan arkhong kha ahongkhuong.

Halli inmani'n Jisu kha ziingtiang ma-ah Caiaphas inn makheiya waikaroonpa omna munkhan inleiruoi. Inmani Sinadan dungjuiya inlei inthiangzoot jarra khat-um Rakaanna Kahoi bubak thanasik, inmani ngaichu waikaroonpa omna munkhan leiluutmu.
Khantia Pilate in inmani diang aheisuok-ah aleirakel, “Nangni'n hiwa miringpa chungnga ang noonkuung omma ningheiruoime?”
Inmani'n amadiang inleimasang, “Hiwa miringpa in akathamak aleithomak inchu, keini'n amahi nang nadiang heiruoinunung.”
Pilate in inmani diang aleiti, “Nangni'n amahi ruoitaru halli nangni Sinadan dungjuiya ama chungnga chong tanru.”
Hiwahi Jisu'n ang omchanna athisikme tia ileirilsuok chongkha huui tungnasik eii. Jn 3:14; 12:32
Pilate in inlet-ah aomna munkhan aluut-ah Jisu kha akoiya, “Nang Jihudi ngai Reng kha na ebe?” tia aleirakel.
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Nang napum tak-in hiwahi nitibe, emakli miring leiilaak in kei jarra nangdiang innatipibe?”
Pilate in aleimasang, “Kei Jihudi ka eyabe? Nang nami ngai tak-in khat-um Thiampu kalian ngai'n nanghi kei kadiang innajuopeii; nang in angme nithopijei?”

Jisu'n aleimasang, “Kei rengramchu hiwa manmasituol ta emak; kei rengram hi hiwa manmasituol ta alei-engai suok inchu, Jihudi ngai kutchungnga kei innapemak nasik, kei kanuk kajui ngai'n raal indeisik eii; takkha kei rengramchu hiwa manmasituol hin emak.”
Pilate in amadiang aleiti, “Enchu nang reng na-ebe?”
Pilate in amadiang aleirakel, “Angkeme akadik?”
Takkha nangni inroonna Dan ningnei khachu Rakaanna Kahoi racham kei'n miring inkhat nangni sik-ah kamasuosik eii; kei'n nangni sik-ah Jihudi ngai Rengpa hi kimasuo ningmanuombe?”
Inmani ngai'n inkheek-ah inleiti “Hiwa miringpa emak, takkha Barabbas kinmanuom.” (Barabbas chu inruup alei eii.)
